items.name: As a controller developer, I would like to have be able to resolve ProvidedCapabilities at different levels of scope so that we can find the optimal balance of reuse of our Capabilities
As a controller developer, I would like perform common operations on the relevant Kubernetes resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
As a support developer, I would like perform common operations on the ProvidedCapability resources through a simple interface to reduce the learning curve
As a controller developer, I would like to specify how my image gets deployed providing only the essential configuration so that  I can focus on my development tasks
As a controller developer, I would like to implement a controller that responds to CapabilityRequirements so that I can extendKubernetes with my own controllers
As a controller developer, I would like to mount persistent storage in the deployed container so that I can store files that persist beyond pod restarts
As a controller developer, I would like to request the Database capability so that I can deploy containers that use the database
As a controller developer, I would like to expose my service over HTTP so that others can access it
As a controller developer, I would like to request the OIDC capability so that I can use it to provide single sign on to my users
